mapper.sql: sr.id as sr_id, sr.platform as sr_platform, sr.templet_code as sr_templet_code, sr.send_account as sr_send_account, sr.content as sr_content, sr.status as sr_status, sr.date_formate as sr_date_formate, sr.add_time as sr_add_time, sr.modify_time as sr_modify_time, sr.is_delete as sr_is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pub_sms_record sr
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pub_sms_record (id, platform, templet_code, send_account, content, status, date_formate, add_time, modify_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateFormate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into pub_sms_record
id,
platform,
templet_code,
send_account,
content,
status,
date_formate,
add_time,
modify_time,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update pub_sms_record sr
sr.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sr.platform = #{record.platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr.templet_code = #{record.templetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr.send_account = #{record.sendAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr.content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sr.date_formate = #{record.dateFormate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sr.add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sr.modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sr.is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update pub_sms_record sr set sr.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sr.platform = #{record.platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr.templet_code = #{record.templetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr.send_account = #{record.sendAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr.content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sr.date_formate = #{record.dateFormate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sr.add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sr.modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sr.is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pub_sms_record
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
templet_code = #{templetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_account = #{sendAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date_formate = #{dateFormate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
